# user

the login user name.

## SYNOPSIS

        --user <$RUNDECK_USER>

## README

Defaults to the environment variable: ${RUNDECK_USER}

## COMMANDS

The following commands use this option.

* [get-system-info](../../commands/get-system-info/index.html)

## METADATA

* `NAME` = user
* `DESCRIPTION` = "the login user name."
* `ARGUMENTS` = true
* `REQUIRED` = true
* `SHORT` = 
* `LONG` = user
* `DEFAULT` = $RUNDECK_USER
* `EXPORT` = false
